title: Woofle's Art Hub
content:
[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --header-title: "Woofle's Art Hub";
    --header-subtitle: "random SCP art that has been made";
}
[[/module]]

[[=]]

[[size 95%]]//Feel free to use any of this art[[footnote]]**For Department Logos/ACS Icons**: If you want an {{.svg}} file, see Footnote 2.[[/footnote]], as long as you credit me! Also, let me know[[footnote]]Send me DM on Instagram ([https://www.instagram.com/_woofle_/ @_woofle_]), email me (officiallywoofle@gmail.com), or (if you are in the [https://discord.com/invite/scp official SCP Foundation Discord server]) send me a DM on Discord (_woofle_)![[/footnote]] once it's used so I can see it!//[[/size]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Foundation Department Logos]]

[[collapsible show="+ Department of Essophysics" hide="- Hide"]]

+++ Department of Essophysics
[[image essophysics.png width="250px" style="border: solid 1px black; border-radius: 13px; background: white; margin: 10px 0px;"]]
> [[[golem-s-icon-page|This design]]] for the [[[departments-complete-list|Department of Essophysics]]] is originally by [[*user GreenGolem]].
> I decided to recreate it so I could start learning Inkscape.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Department of Gaming" hide="- Hide"]]

+++ Department of Gaming
[[image gaming.png width="250px" style="border: solid 1px black; border-radius: 13px; background: white; margin: 10px 0px;"]]
> This is the first logo I designed on my own!
> The [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/departments-complete-list Department of Gaming] usually gets overshadowed by its famous [[[secure-facility-dossier-site-418|Minecraft Division]]], but I figured the overall department deserved some more love.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Department of Musical Anomalies" hide="- Hide"]]

+++ Department of Musical Anomalies
[[image musical_anomalies.png width="250px" style="border: solid 1px black; border-radius: 13px; background: white; margin: 10px 0px;"]]
> The Department of Musical Anomalies doesn't exist anywhere I could find (yet?), it's just a department I figured would make sense due to the amount of [/system:page-tags/tag/musical/ music-related anomalies] on the wiki.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Department of Fundamental Physics" hide="- Hide"]]

+++ Department of Fundamental Physics
[[image fundphy.png width="250px" style="border: solid 1px black; border-radius: 13px; background: white; margin: 10px 0px;"]]
> The Department of Fundamental Physics doesn't exist on the wiki, but I imagined it would be a team of researchers from a bunch of departments/divisions (such as Metaphysics, Pataphysics, Esoteric Physics, Mathematics, Extradimensional Studies, Temporal Anomalies, etc.) that would come together to study the most fundamental systems that govern //everything//.

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Department of Totality" hide="- Hide"]]

+++ Department of Totality
[[image dot.png width="190px" style="padding: 30px; border: solid 1px black; border-radius: 13px; background: white; margin: 10px 0px;"]]
> After working with the concept a bit, I decided to rename the Department of Fundamental Physics into something less "physics-centric." Thus, the Department of Totality, or the DoT, was born!
> "Totality" is the name given for //everything// (think Nexus-00 from [[[SCP-7243]]]), and the DoT is the part of the Foundation that studies it!

[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]
[[tab ACS Icons]]

[[collapsible show="+ Agape" hide="- Hide"]]

+++ Agape
[[image agape-1.png width="200px"]] [[image agape-2.png width="200px"]] [[image agape-3.png width="200px"]]
> "Agape" is the Object Class assigned to [[[weryllium-proposal|Dr. Palanez's Proposal for SCP-001-J]]].
> The word "agape" refers to the highest form of love.
> Made three slightly different versions because I couldn't pick which I liked the most.

[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]
[[tab GoI-related Art]]

[[collapsible show="+ Three Moons Initiative" hide="- Hide"]]

+++ Welcome to Corbenic
[[image corbenic.jpg width="500px" style="margin: 10px 0px;"]]
> Landscape is based on the description of the afterlife from [[[SCP-2922]]], slogan comes from the [[[three-moons-initiative-hub|Three Moons Initiative]]].
> I made this in Photoshop for a final project during my senior year of high school. 

[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]

[[/=]]

[[footnoteblock]]

-----

[[/div]]
[[/=]]
author: Woofle
